title: Topic 003 Question 060
body: You have a Microsoft Sentinel workspace.
You need to prevent a built-in Advanced Security Information Model (ASIM) parser from being updated automatically.
What are two ways to achieve this goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Create a hunting query that references the built-in parser.
Build a custom unifying parser and include the built-in parser version.
Redeploy the built-in parser and specify a CallerContext parameter of Any and a SourceSpecificParser parameter of Any.
Redeploy the built-in parser and specify a CallerContext parameter of Built-in.
Create an analytics rule that includes the built-in parser.
